showScoreExcerpt:

Sounds like Cher to me...As nuts as the whole enterprise is, it goes so far into the absurd that it reinvents the theatrical rules that bio-musicals depend on...It knows what it is and it embraces it. If a musical canâ€™t be high art, at least it can be low art with integrity."
